notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: C.V.M., G.L.M. and J.B.C.: conceived and designed the experiments, performed the experiments, analyzed data and wrote the manuscript. M.N.G., D.P.C., D.A.F.O., A.L.G. and L.M.S.R.: conceived and designed the experiments, performed the experiments, analyzed data. Z.V., E.A.P., M.E.L.M., M.C.B., I.R. and V.C.A.: conceived and designed the experiments; L.W.P.A.: analyzed data; N.F: performed the experiments; A.T.R.V., D.A.M.C. and W.S.: conceived and designed the experiments, wrote the manuscript and coordinated the research.
